name: Hummer Desert Safari Dinner With Private Car
description: The Hummer Safari is an evening of adventurous excursion through the bumpy Arabian sand dunes in a power packed 4X4 luxury Hummer Sports Utility Vehicle (SUV). The Hummer is a versatile vehicle built to travel the ends of the earth to test your limits. Our Hummer Safari will give you a firsthand experience of this fabulous adventure along with live entertainment, performances and a jolly good banquet with the most delicious food.
